game.shortDescription: 헬로키티와 친구들과 함께 아늑한 오픈 월드 모험을 떠나보세요. 신비로운 섬을 탐험하고 복원하며 귀여운 캐릭터들과 친구가 되고, 고대 퍼즐을 풀고, 맛있는 요리를 만들고, 내 모습과 오두막집을 꾸미고, 다양한 활동을 즐겨보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a cozy, open-world adventure with Hello Kitty and Friends. Befriend beloved characters as you explore and restore a mysterious island, solve ancient puzzles, cook delicious dishes, customize yourself and your cabins, and so much more.

reviewHighlights.text: Butters was right all along. This game is so much better than World of Warcraft.
